subject: Hockey, Ice
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: Philadelphia forward Jesse Boulerice was suspended 25 games for cross-checking Vancouver’s Ryan Kesler across the face, the second Flyer in three weeks to receive a ban of at least 20 games.
snippet: Philadelphia forward Jesse Boulerice was suspended 25 games for cross-checking Vancouver’s Ryan Kesler across the face, the second Flyer in three weeks to receive a ban of at least 20 games.
